__e: We fear that the French have taken reprisals against the village.
I've been meaning to tell you... The French have emailed me every single day.
Whenever we're about to do something truly horrible, we always say the French have been doing it for years.
I'd rather die fighting the French and the Indians than get pissed on by the good souls of Salem.
The French and the natives have been plaguing us, but I would say we've acquitted ourselves rather well under the circumstances.
I want to tell them they have to stop depending on the French and the Chinese and empower themselves. The baguette.
The French are tired of talk.
You can't work there without a permit which the French hang on to like their balls.
And the French are nice people once you get used to them.
